""Here are my fantastic range of premium sausages with a meatier more succulent bite. Not only that, but they're also gluten free. I have gone the extra mile to source and use only selected cuts of outdoor bred pork in my sausages. These pigs are born outside and housed in spacious barns with deep straw for comfort, where they can root and forage freely. The perfect pie cannot be made by a machine. Anyone who truly loves pies knows that. So at higgidy we take great care to lovingly craft each pie by hand. We think it shows because people love our pies and recognise that they are a bit special. In fact, they keep demanding more. As you enjoy your higgidy pie, spare a thought for our busy kitchen - it is hard work rolling all that pastry! This one is a real favourite. And if you are feeling really special, serve it with some oven roasted vine tomatoes, torn fresh basil leaves and a splash of balsamic vinegar. .

A higgidy 'thank you': Some food lovers enjoy 'higgidy treat nights'. If you regularly eat higgidy then cut-out the 'use by' dates on the box&keep them safe. If you send us 10 'use by' dates from a 4 month period we'll send you a voucher for another pie or quiche to say 'thank-you' for keeping our cooks busy. See www.higgidy.co.uk/thank-you for details. Higgidy. Camilla made irresistible pies. James built treehouses. James fell in love with Camilla and her pies. So he stopped building treehouses and built her a big kitchen where Camilla's pies could be lovingly baked to perfection. The rest as they say is higgidy... How to make a higgidy pie ........peel and chop up a sweet potato .......roast with spices and garlic........toss into a big bowl with wilted spinach.....stir some crumbled feta and mature cheddar.......add a little softened onion and a spoonful of creamy béchamel........pile into a seeded shortcrust pastry base........sprinkle with cheddar crumb.......and top with a small handful of pumpkin seeds.

At the peak of juicy ripeness, we hand pick, check and gently squeeze the oranges for a sweet, zesty, golden-fresh taste. 60 Years of Passion and Dedication... Since the day we squeezed our first orange over 60 years ago we have strived to make the best tasting juice possible. Each fruit is special and the juice inside it precious. At Tropicana we rely on the environment and have a respect for nature. Lots of things are only fun when it's sunny, like sandcastles, deckchairs and family picnics. We created this little quiche to usher in the summer sunshine, so eat it up quickly, it won't be here for long... A higgidy 'thank you': Some food lovers enjoy 'higgidy treat nights'. If you regularly eat higgidy then cut out the 'use by' dates on the box&keep them safe. Send us 10 'use by' dates from a 4 months period and we'll send you a voucher for another pie or quiche to say 'thank-you' for keeping our cooks busy. Eat me now... If you are feeling peckish this Little Quiche has been baked in our kitchen so is ready to eat - straight from the box. Write and tell us what you think&how you eat yours: thekitchens@higgidy.co.uk. Our higgidy friends. We are gathering a little family of friends who love tasty honest food&like following the story of the higgidy pie-makers fromWest Sussex. Join us: www.higgidy.co.uk/friend. Camilla. (the clever cook that started higgidy)

product.productDescription: This Gressingham Duck breast joint with wing is easy to cook and carve. Duck crown. The well-bred duck. The Gressingham breed came about when the small but flavourful wild Mallard was crossed with the larger Pekin, giving a meaty, succulent duck with more breast meat and less fat. Remember, if it's not from us, it's not Gressingham. The cared-for duck. We breed, hatch, rear, and then prepare the ducks by hand here in the neighbouring counties of Suffolk and Norfolk. We're a family-owned and run business, determined to do the right thing by our ducks. The tasty duck. product.productName: Gressingham duck breasts flllets with orange sauce -
product.productDescription: Ready in 25 minutes. Get tangy by dinnertime. It's remarkably nutritious. Two duck breasts with a delicious orange sauce. We know, we know. You want to enjoy top-notch, homecooked grub, but you haven't got all day. But if you've got 25 minutes (less if you prefer it pink!), there's nothing to stop you putting a superbly saucy duck dinner on the table. You'll find cooking instructions inside this sleeve, but it's as easy as this: cook the duck, heat the sauce, tuck in! The duck. The duck is none other than the remarkable Gressingham breed. A cross between the small-but-tasty wild Mallard and the more generously proportioned Pekin, Gressingham ducks are known for their meaty succulence. The sauce. As tangy as the name suggests, this deliciously orangey number is a new take on the perfect complement to roasted duck breast. The meal. Give Tangy Duck a whirl with buttered couscous and a spinach salad or new potatoes and green beans (or whatever else you fancy). The versatile duck. If Tangy Duck does it for you, find out more about what makes us the remarkable duck people and get some great ideas at www.gressinghamduck.co.uk

Scottish herring, traditionally hand rolled with onions in a sweet marinade. Did you know... The Herring used in our rollmops are caught off the rugged coast of Scotland. The fish is supplied fresh, then cured before being hand-rolled with finely sliced onions and gherkins. They are then prepared in a delicious, traditional, sweet marinade. What is responsibly sourced fish for life®. We love fish. It is all we do, and all we have done for over 200 years. That's why we developed our Fish for Life programme to ensure that all our fish is responsibly sourced. So Young's fish is not only good for you, it's good for the sea too. For loads of great fish recipes and more about our work tohelp conserve fish for future generations visit www.youngsseafood.co.uk

H. Forman & Son marinated anchovies with garlic -
product.productDescription: These Golden Great Taste Award-winning anchovies are a treat you will relish. Unlike salted anchovies, these fish are completely boneless and have been marinated in a delicious garlicky vinegarette. Perfect for dressing a Caesar's salad or a salad Nicoise, or simply great on chunky bread or hot-buttered toast. The anchovies are full of Omega 3 oils and ready to eat straight out of the pack. H. FORMAN&SON. Established in 1905, H. Forman&Son is one of Britain's oldest fish curers. Its reputation has been built upon quality, supplying many of the world's leading chefs. Its philosophy is to use only the finest, natural ingredients and to keep food simple so that the quality and freshness shines through. H.Forman&Son operates from a state-of-the-art factory in East London, adjacent to London's Olympic Park, where it maintains all the traditional artisanal skills of its trade.

product.productName: Gressingham whole spatchcook poussin in sea salt & black pepper -
product.productDescription: Ready in 45 minutes. Spatchcock Poussin. We might be the remarkable duck people but there's room in our hearts and on our plates for other poultry too. Our spatchcock poussin from our friends the Leon family in Brittany, are a special breed that's naturally slow growing so you get meat that's young and tender yet thoroughly flavourful. With our sea salt and four pepper seasoning it makes for a delicious treat, and because it is""spatchcock""it's really quick and easy to cook too. The zingy peppers we've added - green, black, white and fresh red - make thispoussin great with simple new potatoes and veg, but visit our website for other ideas and how-to videos. www.gressinghamduck.co.uk

product.productName: The Black Farmer's Daughter pork chipolatas -

I love my Dad's Premium Pork thick sausages, but sometimes when I have my friends around I prefer these chipolatas. Just as tasty and, of course, gluten free. Scarlett. Facebook/theblackfarmer. Twitter@theblackfarmer. YouTube/Theblackfarmer

product.productName: Musk's 6 Newmarket pork sausages -
product.productDescription: Original recipe. Handmade with care using the finest fully traceable British pork. The recipe for the Newmarket sausage was originally created over 120 years ago by James Musk and is still in use today. They are handmade in small batches, using only the finest British pork. The pork is mixed with bread that has been baked in the traditional manner, together with our secret blend of spices, then encased in natural skins to give them the succulence for which these proper old fashioned sausages are renowned. By Appointment to H.M. Queen Elizabeth II Suppliers of Musks Sausages Musks Limited, Newmarket

product.productName: Musk's 6 Gluten Free pork sausages -
product.productDescription: Handmade with care using the finest fully traceable British pork. The recipe for Musk's Original Sausages was created in Newmarket by James Musk in 1884 and remains a closely guarded secret even today. Musk's Gluten Free Sausages are based on that original recipe but without the bread. They are carefully handmade in small batches - using only the finest British pork, the same secret blend of spices together with rice, and encased in natural skins to bring you the flavour and succulence for which Musk's Sausages are renowned. By Appointment to H.M. Queen Elizabeth II Suppliers of Musks Sausages Musks Limited, Newmarket

product.productName: Simply Sausages 6 smithfield original -
product.productDescription: Freedom food RSPCA monitored. Gourmet 88% British pork sausages with a hint of nutmeg and a pinch of pepper. The Smithfield Original No. 1 Anything but simple... These superior sausages subtly seasoned with a hint of nutmeg and pinch of pepper are inspired by the quintessentially meaty destination - and the original home of Simply Sausages, Smithfield market. This delicious recipe hasn't changed since it was first perfected by Martin Heap in his London sausage emporium. You could simply serve Smithfield Original Recipe No. 1 to the most discerning sausage enthusiasts around, satisfying them with your sizzling skills and creating a succulent meal of which to be proud. Inspired recipes direct from Heap's. The Gourmet Sausage Maker. (Beware of hungry hounds). (and don't forget the mustard)

product.productName: Powters celebrated Newmarket sausages -

product.productDescription: Handmade with care using the finest fully traceable British pork. With over 400 years of trading history between them, Musk's and Aspall have united to create these pork and cyder sausages which combine all the succulence expected of a Musk's sausage with the distinctive flavour of Aspall cyder. Musk's having been trading from Newmarket High Street since 1884. They have been making the authentic Newmarket sausage since then and these sausages are a subtle change to that recipe. Aspall have been producing cyder in Suffolk since 1728. The cyderingredient in these exquisite Musk's sausages is Aspall Premier Cru which has won the coveted 'Worlds Best Cyder' for the last two years.! Truly a Suffolk product of exemplary heritage. product.productName: Inverawe Loch Etive smoked trout -
product.productDescription: A natural product traditionally smoked. From the west coast of Argyll. Smoked Loch Etive trout. Inverawe - Scotland's Specialists. The Inverawe family business was established in 1974 by Robert&Rosie Campbell-Preston. The smokehouse nestles at the foot of Ben Cruachan on the beautiful chores of Loch Etive. Inverawe has perfected a product to truly satisfy both the gourmet and connoisseur. Inverawe's unique traditional smoking technique, along with a superb supply of fresh fish, results in a very special natural product. Each fish is hand cured and hung in brick kilns, over oak-log fires, where it gently draws in its delicious smokey flavour. Our skilled craftsmen know instinctively when a side is ready.
